q_en: What are the cutting tasks for customers who are PolyU?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (1, 9);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs for the orders of customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, p.attributes AS product_attributes, pt.description AS product_type FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE op.id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 31);
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks for the order products of customer "PolyU"

response:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks for the customer "PolyU". I've organized the details into a neat table for you. üòä
